name: NaviSync
description: Periodically syncs Spotify playlists to Navidrome.
author: Rupan (JEFF7712)

config.name: sync_interval
config.title: Sync Interval
config.description: Cron expression for sync schedule (default: every 6 hours)

config.name: playlists_filter
config.title: Playlists Filter
config.description: Comma-separated list of playlist names to sync (leave empty for all)

config.name: remove_deleted_tracks
config.title: Remove Deleted Tracks
config.description: Remove tracks from Navidrome playlist if they are removed from Spotify
